text:
Vehicle Data Science Corp - Oakland, CA - Sr Software Engineer

VDS teaches autonomous vehicles how to drive. We provide kinematic models of the road network by processing vehicle sensor data (GPS, IMU, camera, etc).

Federal funding through NSF and DOT. Revenue generating through large OEM customers.

Python, Postgres/PostGIS

Competitive salary. Early-stage equity. Fun, small team. More at https://angel.co/vehicle-data-science-corp/jobs/45644-senior....

Thanks!
